GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 06 October 2024

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at most places in the island during the afternoon or night. Showers
may occur in Western, North-western and Northern provinces and in Galle and Matara districts during the
morning too.

F
airly heavy showers above 75mm are likely at some places in Northern, North-central, North-western,
Central, Eastern and Uva province.
The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary
localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
